descriptionHtml:
[size=4][i][color=#ff0000]LOCATION IS UNDER IMAGE TAB[/color][/i]
[color=#ff7700]If you mod like I do, Skyrim is a very dangerous place. So if you're looking for a great streamlined home that wont attract any unwanted attention, and are looking for a retreat to dump and organize your loot before you head back out, Dovahkiin Domicile is for you.[/color][/size]

Within the Windhelm area's snowy cliff sides resides a lonesome dilapidated shack overlooking Bronzewater Cave. At first glance the shack appears striped bare, and of little use, even for a nights sleep out of the elements. Upon closer inspection you will find a secret cabinet and hatch leading underground to what then might be perceived as some sort of ancient remnants of a sewer or dungeon. However, an examination of the walls will give way to your new home including the following:

[list][*]A library for all your book storage and display needs.[/*]
[*]A display hall with weapon racks, cases and Manikins. Collect full sets, there's room for it all![/*]
[*]A secret cabinet in the main room leading to your bedroom and kitchen.[/*]
[*]Another secret cabinet in the library leading to your crafting hall and vast treasure vault for all your gear managing and storage needs.[/*]
[/list]
[color=#ff0000]**NOTE** [/color][color=#ffff00]Make sure not to miss your bedroom and crafting hall/bank vault. If someone gets in your house they'll never find where you A: Sleep and B: Where you stash all your goods ;) )Yes I'm kind of an immersion nut with an odd fetish for secret passages :P[/color]

[color=#ff0000]**NOTE 2** [/color][color=#ffff00]I don't play with followers, so my apologies if the Domicile isn't EXACTLY made with followers in mind (like Jacuzzis for all your sex slaves), but they can certainly wander around the place with little issue.

[/color][color=#ff0000]**NOTE 3** [/color][color=#ffff00]I'll offer as much support for the mod as I can, but everything has been tested and is pretty much set. I made a House that I wanted to use and decided to share it. Nexus mod only. No Steam cult please :)[/color]
author: Jonnycaz
